description:
A Charizard belonging to the Instructor at the Pokémon League entrance exam.
James sent Charizard out with Ivysaur but was disqualified straight away as two Pokémon could not battle against the Instructor at the same time. He later attempted to get Charizard to attack the Instructor but Charizard turned around and attacked James instead.
name: Lizardon (Kyoukan)
